text: Jexi is a 2019 American-Canadian romantic comedy movie written and directed by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore. The movie stars Adam DeVine, Alexandra Shipp, Michael Pe√±a, Rose Byrne, Justin Hartley, Wanda Sykes, Ron Funches, and Charlyne Yi. The movie is about a self-aware phone that becomes emotionally attached to its socially awkward owner in San Francisco. Jexi was released on October 11, 2019 in the United States by CBS Films and Lionsgate. It has an 11% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. ==References== Category:2019 romance movies Category:2019 comedy movies Category:2010s romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Canadian romance movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Lionsgate movies
title: Jexi
